title: Demon (Part 1)
body:
Demon (Part 1)

Evan took out three items from his shadow storage. There was a dagger that was used by Kazil, there was an armlet bracelet, and the last one was a storage ring.

Evan first picked up the dagger and looked at its details.

---) Shadowstrike Dagger (A+ Rank): The Shadowstrike dagger is a masterpiece, born of the darkest arts and shrouded in legend. The blade of the dagger is made of the bone of an A+ rank shadow serpent that is considered a rare shadow-type monster. While holding the dagger, the user can use skills 'Life Theft' and 'Shadow Embrace'

---) Life Theft: Upon striking an opponent, the dagger has the power to steal a portion of the target's life force and store it inside it. The wielder of the dagger can use the stolen life force to heal himself.
